messages.subject: Re: [SPAM] [nihontostudy] Help needed for identification
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Michel, sorry but you cannot put images in your email. You need to put them in a photo album somewhere first and link them to the email. This Yahoo group
messages.messageBody:
Hi Michel, sorry but you cannot put images in your email. You need to
put them in a photo album somewhere first and link them to the email.
This Yahoo group has its own photo album section.

Cheers

Richard

> white metal dots on weeds leaves and water) -

messages.subject: Help needed for identification
messages.msgSnippet: Dear all, Can somebody give me some hints for identifying this tsuba - I have seen a similar enough one  ( ie geese, weeds, water) in early 20th century french
messages.messageBody:
Dear all,

Can somebody give me some hints for identifying this tsuba - I have seen a similar enough one ( ie geese, weeds, water) in early 20th century french auction catalogs ( however picture without any description).

Diameter 80mm - some incrustations ( yellow metal on geese eyes and white metal dots on weeds leaves and water) -

Thanks for help

Michel Cuni

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
